amendment.description: To protect the health and safety of Americans.

vote.text: Amendment SA 947 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 947 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Cochran to Amendment SA 946. (consideration: CR S8203-8215; text: CR S8203) To protect the health and safety of Americans.
